E-Mail Messages
Date: Sunday, 2/5/1992
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Don Slaught



Date: Monday, 2/6/1992
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Philadelphia!

Regards,
Don Slaught



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Dave Hollins
Dear Sir,
Dave Hollins isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Erie Sea Wolves!
He has an AVG of .233, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/4/1992
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Ron Darling

Sincerely,
R.J. Reynolds

Date: Thursday, 6/15/1992
Subject: Status of Brent Brede
Dear Sir,
Brent Brede shouldn't play at AA Erie Sea Wolves!
He has an AVG of .232 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 7/4/1992
Subject: Progress of Jorge Posada
Dear Sir,
Jorge Posada has nothing more to prove at A Bradenton Marauders!
He has an AVG of .290 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
